dict.acceptation: 名气，名声；好名声；信誉，声望；荣誉，名望；

sent.orig: Brand reputation measurement, including the public reputation, social reputation and industry reputation.
sent.trans: 品牌美誉度的测量包括公众美誉度、社会美誉度和行业美誉度。

sent.orig: Reputation - Luxembourg and Dublin have an excellent reputation for their regulation.
sent.trans: ＊信誉：卢森堡和都柏林在管制方面有很好的信誉。

sent.orig: At the same, rockshao zhi with century-old shop's reputation, reputation abroad, and became friendly diplomatic gifts.
sent.trans: 同时邵芝岩凭着百年老店的声誉，扬名海外，并成为外交上友好的赠品。

sent.orig: Internet reputation is the reputation of a man a substance or a thing in cyber space.
sent.trans: 网络声望就是具体的人、事或物在网络空间中的声望。

sent.orig: Industry Reputation: Have A Good Business Reputation.
sent.trans: 行业口碑：具备良好的商业信誉。
